data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AREND cruise from Fort Amsterdam to Hellevoetsluis started at 1780-07-30
Ship: Arend (Fregat), Voyage: Fort Amsterdam - Hellevoetsluis, 1st Observer: J. Delvos (Kapitein), 2nd Observer: Cornelis Brooshoofd (Schipper), Company: ADM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
